alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Ellis; Greer; Harmon; Harper; Jackson; Roger Mills; Woods; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 14 at 2:33AM CDT until April 14 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning for parts of western Oklahoma and western- north Texas on Friday afternoon... .Hot, dry and breezy conditions behind a dryline will create conditions favorable for fire start and spread this afternoon through this evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR HOT TEMPERATURES, LOW HUMIDITY AND BREEZY WINDS FOR WESTERN OKLAHOMA AND WESTERN-NORTH TEXAS... The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a Red Flag Warning for hot temperatures, low humidity and breezy winds, which is in effect from 1 PM CDT this afternoon to 9 PM CDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * TIMING...1 to 9 PM Friday. * WINDS...Southwest 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 10 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Upper 80s to low 90s. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop could spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is discouraged.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Ellis; Greer; Harmon; Harper; Jackson; Roger Mills; Woods; Woodward
